text: Elias Lasisi (born 9 January 1992) is a Belgian professional basketball player, who lastly played for BG Göttingen of the Basketball Bundesliga. He has also been a member of the Belgium national basketball team. ==Professional career== Lasisi formerly played in Belgium for Leuven Bears, Limburg United and Oostende. With Oostende, Lasisi won two Pro Basketball League titles. On 22 August 2019, Lasisi signed with BG Göttingen in Germany. ==National team career== Lasisi was selected for Belgium for the 2019 FIBA Basketball World Cup qualification games against Bosnia and Herzegovina and France. ==References== ==External links== * RealGM.com profile Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Belgian men's basketball players Category:BC Oostende players Category:BG Göttingen players Category:Leuven Bears players Category:Limburg United players Category:People from Leuven Category:Shooting guards
title: Elias Lasisi
